attributes.action: Repat our British Citizens back to the UK from India due to Covid-19
attributes.additional_details: I would like the Government to take responsibility to get their nationals home safely. It would be beneficial to organise flights and work alongside the Indian Government to ensure their safety.
attributes.background: My family members who are elderly and have medical conditions are stuck in Punjab, India. There is currently a lock down in Punjab and every flight keeps getting cancelled. We would like support to get our family home back to the UK where they can self isolate safely.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/307260

Since you started your petition the Government has announced a new government partnership with airlines to fly back more tourists stranded abroad: https://www.gov.uk/government/news/new-government-partnership-with-airlines-to-fly-back-more-tourists-stranded-abroad

You can find out more about coronavirus and how you can protect yourself and others here:

NHS website: https://www.nhs.uk/conditions/coronavirus-covid-19/
UK Government website: https://www.gov.uk/coronavirus

You can read NHS tips to help if you are worried about coronavirus here: https://www.nhs.uk/oneyou/every-mind-matters/coronavirus-covid-19-anxiety-tips
